message:
SYSTEM: Deep_learning_applications_OEG.pdf: Página 8
MarI/O
MarI/O learned an entire level of 
Super Mario World in 34 tries
Nothing assumed
Input of the ANN: black moving 
position and white static positions 
Output: a console button
Based on NeuroEvolution of 
Augmenting Topologies (NEAT) 
a genetic algorithm for the 
generation of evolving ANN 
developed by Ken Stanley in 2002
8
MarI/O - Machine Learning for Video Games
speaker: SYSTEM
